buildup.text: Sign language is useful in noisy environments, underwater, through windows, and across distances.

discovery.text: Studies show that learning sign improves spatial reasoning, memory, and multitasking ability.

twist.text: In a world obsessed with inclusion, most hearing people can't say 'hello' to a deaf person.
